QuestData.Title: The Port of Zandalar
QuestData.Description: King Rastakhan has given me orders to investigate de Harbor of Zandalar. De claim Princess Talanji has levied against General Jakra'zet for failing to maintain de safety of our kingdom is a serious accusation.$b$bFor dis task, I would have you join me so dat I might have an outside perspective. When you are ready, meet me in de Grand Bazaar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Zolani in the Grand Bazaar.
